name: Drive Home
description:
Avoid obstacles and try to get home as early as you can! After all home is where you are surrounded by people you care about. Switch lanes by using the X,Y,B, and A buttons on a controller.

Drive home is only playable on  a Windows PC, and can be played using an Xbox controller.

Credits:

Programming: John Miele

3D Modeling/Art: Ray Rivera, Michael Stoess, Gabby Collado

Music/Sound Design: Austin Blau
